text: Alexander Francis Wojciechowicz (born August 12, 1915 in South River, New Jersey - died July 13, 1992 in Forked River, New Jersey) was an American football Center who played for the Detroit Lions and the Philadelphia Eagles of the NFL. Wojciechowicz was inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1968. Wojciechowicz was the Detroit Lions first pick in the 1938 NFL Draft. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:1992 deaths Category:American football centers Category:Detroit Lions players Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey
title: Alex Wojciechowicz
